content: this airy wrap featuring scallop shells and stripes is the perfect accessory whether you re just enjoying the fall season outdoors or having a day out with friends it s simple to achieve the look of stripes with the color changing yarn while an easy pattern repeat makes it fun to create feminine and light you can wear it as a shawl scarf or cover-up materials us size i 5 25 hook 3 skeins lion brand ferris wheel yarn in cherry on top 85 g/skein find the kit here or just the yarn on the lion brand site here pattern uses approximately 255 g total scissors the pattern is a four row repeat and is fairly easy it s not for beginners but definitely doable for intermediate crocheters thank you
